goals__remit:
The aims of the EFVV are to: 
•    Provide information on the adverse effects of vaccination and the resulting financial, social and psychological impact on society. 
•    Promote freedom of choice regarding vaccination in all European countries.  This involves the abolition of mandatory vaccination policy and the elimination of all medical, financial and social pressure with respect to vaccination whether for children or for adults. 
•    Provide a forum where European groups may exchange ideas and information on vaccination and its risks. 
•    Establish common strategy and both draft and implement common European campaigns on the aforementioned topic.
